forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind around 13 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 12 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As the day breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle serenity lingers in the slightly cool air, with temperatures resting comfortably around fifty-seven degrees. A veil of partly cloudy skies offers a soft diffusion of light, balancing warmth and chill, while a brisk west-southwest wind carries whispers from the bay, dancing through the streets at about thirteen miles per hour. 

Saturday promises a sun-soaked embrace in the afternoon, with highs nearing seventy degrees as the skies clear beautifully. The wind will invigorate, ratcheting up to a lively twenty-two miles per hour, reminding us of the city’s coastal embrace. While the presence of fog may grace the edges of the Golden Gate with a delicate mist, the heart of the city will bask decidedly in sunlight, an invitation for urban exploration. Dress in light layers—a breathable tee with a light jacket will feel just right as you navigate the streets. Consider taking a leisurely stroll down to the waterfront, perhaps indulging in a local café’s offerings or visiting a quiet park to savor the sunshine before the afternoon flees. These hours are fleeting, a rare San Francisco day beckoning you to experience its charms.
